backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Passing of By-law 45-2021 - 55 Lake Shore Boulevard East

contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law 45-2021 to designate 55 Lake Shore Boulevard East (Spadina-Fort York, Ward 10) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: 2020.PB19.1 - Intention to Designate under Part IV, Section 29 of the Ontario Heritage Act - 55 Lake Shore Boulevard East

By-law 45-2021 - To designate the property at 55 Lake Shore Boulevard East as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

signedBy: John D. Elvidge, Interim City Clerk
subheading: In the Matter of the Ontario Heritage Act R.S.O. 1990 Chapter 0.18 and 55 Lake Shore Boulevard East, City of Toronto, Province of Ontario
